document.discussion_title: G4S plc (GFS) Given “Underperform” Rating at BNP Paribas
document.topic_text: Tweet G4S plc (LON:GFS) ‘s stock had its “underperform” rating reissued by equities researchers at BNP Paribas in a research report issued on Monday. They presently have a GBX 195 ($2.51) target price on the stock. BNP Paribas’ price objective suggests a potential downside of 14.96% from the company’s previous close. In related news, insider Almanza,Ashley sold 51,407 shares of G4S plc stock in a transaction that occurred on Tuesday, May 24th. The stock was sold at an average price of GBX 187 ($2.41), for a total transaction of £96,131.09 ($123,784.56). Other equities analysts have also recently issued reports about the company. Jefferies Group raised their price objective on G4S plc from GBX 157 ($2.02) to GBX 160 ($2.06) and gave the company an “underperform” rating in a report on Thursday, August 11th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. reissued an “overweight” rating and set a GBX 298 ($3.84) price objective on shares of G4S plc in a report on Thursday, May 19th. Credit Suisse Group AG raised their price objective on G4S plc from GBX 210 ($2.70) to GBX 275 ($3.54) and gave the company an “outperform” rating in a report on Monday, August 15th. Beaufort Securities raised G4S plc to a “hold” rating in a report on Thursday, August 11th. Finally, Deutsche Bank AG reissued a “sell” rating and set a GBX 165 ($2.12) price objective on shares of G4S plc in a report on Thursday, August 11th. Five research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, six have assigned a hold rating and three have issued a buy rating to the company’s stock. The company currently has an average rating of “Hold” and an average price target of GBX 213.49 ($2.75). //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/g4s-plc-gfs-given-underperform-rating-at-bnp-paribas/ G4S plc ( LON:GFS ) opened at 232.30 on Monday. The company’s market capitalization is GBX 3.59 billion. The company has a 50 day moving average price of GBX 192.25 and a 200-day moving average price of GBX 191.18. G4S plc has a one year low of GBX 145.00 and a one year high of GBX 259.90. The company also recently declared a dividend, which will be paid on Friday, October 14th. Investors of record on Thursday, September 1st will be given a dividend of GBX 3.59 ($0.05) per share. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, September 1st. This represents a dividend yield of 1.58%. G4S Plc is a United Kingdom-based security company engaged in the provision of security products services and solutions. The Company provides services across sectors, including Government, private energy and utilities, oil and gas, transport and logistics, ports and airports, leisure and tourism, financial institutions, mining, corporates and industrials, and retail. Receive News & Ratings for G4S plc G4S plc
